text: Ezɨma Sol, an ziar mam Pol, Godɨn Duam a gizɨvazɨma, ezɨ a dɨkɨravɨra Elimasɨn garava kamaghɨn mɨgei,(13:9) Ziar kam Sol, a Hibrun akamɨn otivir ziar mam. Ezɨ ziar kam Pol, a Grighɨn akam otivir ziam. Gumazir maba ghaze, Sol Grighɨn akamɨn mɨgeir darasi tongɨn ingara, egha kamaghɨn dughiar kamɨn a ziar kam Pol uabɨ garɨsi.
